title: GitLab security advisory (AV25-620)
description: On September 25, 2025, GitLab published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: GitLab Community Edition (CE)  versions prior to 18.4.1, 18.3.3 and 18.2.7
GitLab Enterprise Edition (EE)  versions prior to 18.4.1, 18.3.3 and 18.2.7
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
